passives.desc: Slightly raises SPD for 3 turns upon unleashing a critical hit in Ninja mode
passives.short_desc: Ninja War Tactics: Raises SPD

passives.name: Sage's Expertise
passives.desc: Largely raises MAX BRV、 moderately raises SPD while Sage active
passives.short_desc: Sage's Wisdom: Raises MAX BRV、 SPD

passives.name: Blizzard Combo Extension
passives.desc:
Blizzard Combo use +1

When using Blizzard Combo:
 • Large BRV damage boost
 • Triggers additional HP attack

When using Blizzard Combo while Sage II、 III active:
 • BRV Attack becomes Blizzard (氷 magic BRV attack)
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets

While Sage III active:
 • BRV Attack becomes Blizzard+ (5-hit 氷 magic BRV attack; largely increased cumulative BRV damage)
passives.short_desc: Blizzard Combo Extension: Boost to Blizzard Combo

passives.name: Ninja Secrets
passives.desc: Largely raises MAX BRV、 moderately raises SPD while Ninja active
passives.short_desc: Ninja Secrets: Raises MAX BRV、 SPD

passives.name: Multi-Hit Extension
passives.desc:
Multi-Hit use +1

When using Multi-Hit:
 • Large BRV damage boost
 • Triggers additional HP attack

While Ninja II、 III active:
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

While Ninja III active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (6-hit melee BRV attack; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage)
passives.short_desc: Multi-Hit Extension: Boost to Multi-Hit

passive.name: Blizzard Enchant All Growth
passive.desc: Blizzard Enchant All use +1\n\nBlizzard Enchant All effect duration +2
passive.short_desc: Blizzard Enchant All Growth: Boost to Blizzard Enchant All

passive.name: Deep Insight
passive.desc: When using Blizzard Combo:\n • BRV damage boost\n • Raises Sage level to 2
passive.short_desc: Deep Insight: Boost to Blizzard Combo

passive.name: Onion Strike
passive.desc:
When using Multi-Hit:
 • BRV damage boost
 • Turn rate+
 • Raises Ninja level to 2
 • Self: 4 turns MAX BRV Up I、 ATK Up I

passive.short_desc: Follower of Two Paths: May equip Blade Torrent

passives.short_desc: Blade Torrent Recast Up: Raises recast speed of Blade Torrent、 Meteorite

passive.short_desc: Dark Youth's Power: Increases BRV damage dealt with Blizzard Combo、 Multi-Hit

passive.name: Follower of Two Paths Extension
passive.desc: Boost to EX ability Blade Torrent
passive.short_desc: Follower of Two Paths Extension: Boost to Blade Torrent

passives.name: Blade Torrent Buff Debuff Plus Force Meteorite HP Equal Attack
passives.desc:
When using Blade Torrent、 Meteorite:
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • All targets: 4 turns 氷 Resist Down
 • Self: 4 turns Forbidden Land's Power

When using Meteorite:
 • HP attack becomes group attack
Deals total HP damage to each target
passives.short_desc: Blade Torrent Buff Debuff Plus Force Meteorite HP Equal Attack: Boost to Blade Torrent

passives.name: Follower of Two Paths Extension Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: While equipping EX+ weapon Serpent Sword (III)+ or passive ability Follower of Two Paths Extension:\n • Moderately raises MAX BRV、 ATK
passives.short_desc: Follower of Two Paths Extension Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Blade Torrent Buff Ability Aspir Recast Charge Starting
passives.desc:
At start of quest:
 • 6 turns Forbidden Land's Power
 • First turn does not consume use count
 • First turn rate becomes instantaneous
 • First turn does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning、 support
 • Recast gauge filled 70%
passives.short_desc: Blade Torrent Buff Ability Aspir Recast Charge Starting: Forbidden Land's Power at start of quest

passives.name: Blade Torrent Force Advance+
passives.desc:
When using Blade Torrent:
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%

When using Meteorite:
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

While equipping EX+ weapon Serpent Sword (III)+ or passive ability Follower of Two Paths Extension:
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Ninja) (3-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; higher turn rate) while Ninja active
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Sage) (group 氷 magic BRV attack + single-target HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; deals 20% HP damage to non-targets) while Sage active
passives.short_desc: Blade Torrent Force Advance+: Boost to Blade Torrent
